alert.note: Alert for Jack; Montague; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 3:33PM CDT until April 02 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MONTAGUE...NORTHERN WISE AND NORTHEASTERN JACK COUNTIES... At 332 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunset, or 12 miles southeast of Bowie, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Bridgeport, Bowie, Jacksboro, Alvord, Chico, Sunset, Lake Amon G Carter, Newport, Runaway Bay, Lake Bridgeport, Montague, Cundiff, Lost Creek Reservoir, Fruitland, Park Springs, Crafton and Mallard. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas.
